item.title: HD ivy tree in forrest wallpaper
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Davidude:

I think it looks pretty good. Both pictures look very realistic, but at the same time they look fake.

Yea, its because the bark texture isn’t very high res and the vines dont blend in that well. Been up all night and im fucking with some settings out side of vray right now.

Oh yea, forgot to update this. Heres the final:

Ill call it done now.

Thats without vray also.

Read full topic

item.title: HD ivy tree in forrest wallpaper
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:3, topic:343656”]Yeah it’s like dead cracked vines or paper cutout vines. I wish the trees had more of a displacement type bark though.

What plugin is that? Haven’t looked into any organic creation plugins besides XFlow for C4D.[/quote]
http://graphics.uni-konstanz.de/~luft/ivy_generator/ standalone

Really nice, but i wish it would put more quality in the branches.

Read full topic
